name: Gazul'Journey
description:
This is my very first game, made following the tutorial of Blackthorn prod from Udemy about creating your first game. 

I tried to add more features and stuff. 
Don't judge too hard ;)
Will provide the pixel art I created for this for free on OpengameArt and itch soon. 
I am starting a YT channel to document my indie game dev journey from the beginning, will share soon as well !
